results.title: Hirose CES 2024 - Registration is open
results.content: LET US KNOW! FIND US AT THE SHOW DISCOVER WHAT'S NEXT IN CONNECTIVITY: Hirose's Innovative Line-Up CONSUMER ELECTRONICS BK35 SERIES Hybrid Power & Signal FPC-to-Board Connector. High-Speed Transmission. Fully Shielded. BM55 SERIES 0.3mm Pitch, 0.5mm Stacking Height, Ultra Compact Hybrid FPC-to-Board Connector FH82 SERIES
results.raw_content:
CES® Is the Global Stage for Innovation
CES® is the most powerful tech event in the world — the proving ground for breakthrough technologies and global innovators. This is where brands get business done, meet new partners and where the industry’s sharpest minds take the stage to unveil their latest releases and boldest breakthroughs. Owned and produced by the Consumer Technology Association (CTA)®, CES is the only trade show that showcases the entire tech landscape at one event.
Experience Cutting-Edge Innovations
SHOW HOURS:
Tuesday, January 9Expo hours: 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. PST
Wednesday, January 10Expo hours: 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. PSTThursday, January 11Expo hours: 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. PST
Friday, January 12Expo hours: 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. PST
DISCOVER WHAT'S NEXT
IN CONNECTIVITY:
Hirose's Innovative Line-Up
CONSUMER ELECTRONICS
Hybrid Power & Signal FPC-to-Board Connector. High-Speed Transmission. Fully Shielded.
0.3mm Pitch, 0.5mm Stacking Height, Ultra Compact Hybrid FPC-to-Board Connector
0.25mm Pitch, 0.65mm Height, Top Contact, One Action Lock, FPC Connector
Next-Generation USB Standard USB Type-C™ Connectors
Compact 2-Piece Board-to-FPC Automotive Connector. Robust Lock. High Heat Resistant.
Automotive USB Type-C Connector — Robust, High-Speed, and Versatile.
High Vibration Resistant, Board-to-Board Connector for High Power Connection.
Small Floating Board-to-Board Connector, 125ºC Heat Resistance
LOOKING FOR SOMETHING ELSE
WANT TO CONNECT?
